execution_plan.description: Get all distinct order_item_id values that have been shipped from the shipments database.
Find the product_id values for the shipped order items by looking up Order_Items in the orders database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT product_id, order_item_id FROM Order_Items WHERE order_item_id IN ($step1.order_item_id);

execution_plan.description: Retrieve product names and colors from the products database for the product_ids identified in step 2.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT product_id, product_name, product_color FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step2.product_id);
